title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 209.5 - Voiding management contracts
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 209.5 - Voiding management contracts

State Regulations
A professional boxing or professional mixed martial arts
management contract that has been filed with and approved by the Commission may
be voided, in whole or in part, in the discretion of the Commission, if either
party ceases to possess a valid license issued by the Commission, or upon an
adjudication by the Commission that either party has substantially breached the
terms thereof or as a result of a determination by the Commission that a party
has violated the law or rules of the Commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes

Adopted

New

York State Register September 21, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 38, eff. 9/21/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
